SELECT c.course_id AS courseId, c.category_id AS categoryId, c.user_id AS userId, c.title AS title, c.description AS description, c.price AS price, c.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, c.detail_img_url AS detailImgUrl, c.open_type AS openType, c.status AS status, c.delete_flg AS deleteFlg, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.updated_at AS updatedAt,
u.name AS instructorName, cat.name AS categoryName,
CASE WHEN c.open_type = 'ALWAYS' THEN '무제한' WHEN c.open_type = 'PERIOD' THEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(c.open_start, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(c.open_end, '%Y-%m-%d')) ELSE '무제한' END AS periodText FROM course c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN category cat ON c.category_id = cat.category_id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId} AND c.delete_flg = 0

SELECT ch.chapter_id AS chapterId, ch.course_id AS courseId, ch.title AS title, ch.order_index AS orderIndex, ch.section_title AS sectionTitle FROM chapter ch WHERE ch.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY ch.order_index ASC
